description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The interface declares callback methods related to container lifecycle events that accept a JsonObject reference as parameter.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class with virtual callback methods for handling container events such as start, stop, failure, and state change.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container starts, with event data provided as a JsonObject.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container stops, with event data provided as a JsonObject.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container fails, with event data provided as a JsonObject.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container's state changes, with event data provided as a JsonObject.
